ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Venril
ygData.msgSnippet: I also understood Lifetap was a poison resist type thing, but interested to hear more experienced people s opinions since I ve never faced it in the field yet,
ygData.messageBody:
I also understood Lifetap was a poison resist type thing, but
interested to hear more experienced people's opinions since I've never
faced it in the field yet, phew!

--
Melaniel, Wood Elf Bard (44)
Ginnunga
... my first real guild, and it's got a silly name!

Mith Marr server

On Tue, 30 May 2000 05:54:26 -0700, you wrote:

>I am pretty sure lifetap is pure magic resistance
>Venril did no disease/posion dots. Just melee and that lifetap from what i
>can tell.
>
>Gendal Concorden, lvl 55 Bard of Talisman - Tuanre
>Enoch Lyciferous, lvl 51 Necro
>----- Original Message -----
>From: "Kevin L. Crawford" <Lyrnia@...>
>To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
>Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 5:33 AM
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Venril
>
>
>> If it's lifetap you need to have the bards sing "Purifying Rhytms" I would
>> also throw in Hymn and Nivs and the 50+ healing song as well. That should
>> help to counter the lifetap nicely. Alternately sing Purifying Rhythms,
>FCC
>> and TCF. Also any poison resist spells your clerics/shaman/druids can
>cast
>> on you. Lifetap is a Poison Resist Check.
>>
>> Maestro of Rancor uses a Lifetap type spell that does nearly as much dmg
>> which is area affect and using poison resistance gear/songs/spells people
>> can usually take him down without too much trouble.
>>
>> Good luck!
>>
>> Lyrnia Jongleur
>> Bard of Norrath
>> <Travelers of Norrath>
>> Saryrn Server
